publications.title: PyLasso: a PyMOL plugin to identify lassos
publications.abstract: In this work we introduce PyLasso - a PyMOL plugin to identify lassos in proteins

publications.title: Topological knots and links in proteins
publications.journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
publications.abstract: In this work we show that proteins can be linked and we study the folding pathway of linked proteins

publications.title: To Tie or Not to Tie? That Is the Question
publications.abstract: In this work we review the current knowledge on the knots, links, and lassos in proteins
